body:
Comment 2 by **dylan.g.maxwell**: 
In my case I would like to reuse the ServeFile function from the http package.  As a
work around I have added patched versions of Go's TempFile and TempDir implementations
directly into my application. 

User control over the name of a temp file must be somewhat important because a prefix
can be specified.  It seems unnecessary to restrict users to only specify a prefix.
